question: As per the report released by which organization, the average income earned by MGNREGA workers has doubled?
explanation:
As per a CRISIL report, the average income earned by MGNREGA (Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act) workers has doubled during the COVID lockdown.
As per the report, the income for unskilled labourers has doubled to around Rs.1000 per month during April to July 2020 from Rs.509 in the previous year. Also, this period witnessed growth in work execution by 46% in person-days.
